did.unittitle: Minutes of Meetings of the Student Body Organization, 1904-1936

origination.label: Creator:

did.abstract: The Students Association was created in 1904 and changed to the Student Body Organization in 1914. This collection contains holograph, with typescript letters, notes and petitions laid in.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Minutes of Meetings of the Student Body Organization (AZ 073). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: The Students Association was created in 1904 and changed to the Student Body Organization in 1914. The Athletic Association, which began in 1899, was absorbed by the Student Body Organization in 1914. The Student Body Organization became the Associated Students of The University of Arizona in 1931.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into volumes by subject and date range.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Holograph, with typescript letters, notes and petitions laid in. Contents include: v.1. Athletic Association of The University of Arizona, 1904-1913.; v.2. Student Body Organization, 1915-1918; Treasurer's accounts, 1913-1914; and House of Representatives voting record, 1914-1917; v.3. Student Body Organization, 1921-1925; House of Representatives, 1921-1923; v.4. House of Representatives, 1923-1926; v.5. Student Body Organization, 1925-1936; v.6. Student Council, 1923-1936.
